citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 12-DEC-
21. The Inspector attempted to make contact by phone and left a message requesting a return call. The "Sorry We
Missed You" note was left on the door.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 12-DEC-
21.  The Inspector attempted to make contact by phone and left a message requesting a return call.  The "Sorry We 
Missed You" note was left on the door. 
 
 
 
End Section
